Ingredients.1: 6  fresh tomatillos, husks discarded and tomatillos rinsed

Ingredients.5: 0.5 cups water, or amount to cover

Ingredients.8: 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, or to taste

Ingredients.9: 3  ripe avocados, halved lengthwise and pitted

Directions.1: Place tomatillos, onion, garlic, and jalapeno peppers into a saucepan over medium heat, and pour in enough water to cover. Bring the mixture to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until the tomatillos soften and change color from bright green to a yellow-green color, 5 to 8 minutes.

Directions.2: With a slotted spoon, transfer vegetables to a blender, filling the pitcher no more than halfway full. Hold down the lid of the blender with a folded kitchen towel, and carefully start the blender, using a few quick pulses to get the tomatillo mixture moving before leaving it on to puree. Puree until smooth, about 1 minute; mix in salt, cilantro, and lime juice. Blend again for a few seconds just to mix.

Directions.3: Scoop out the avocado flesh, and place into the blender; blend until well mixed. Adjust salt, cilantro, and lime juice before serving.
